resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158084</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158084</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2682</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A collection of animations of the earth as seen from various perspectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Animationen der Masse, wie von 
den verschiedenen Perspektiven gesehen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'animations de la terre comme vu 
de diverses perspectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção dos animations da terra como visto 
dos vários perspectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di animazioni della terra come 
visto dalle varie prospettive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των ζωτικοτήτων της γης όπως 
βλέπει από τις διάφορες προοπτικές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de las animaciones de la tierra 
según lo visto de varias perspectivas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this collection ther are various animations of the revolving earth, each showing such phenomona as weather changes, earthquakes, temperature changes, volcanoes , seasons and others.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seasons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Ansammlung ther sind verschiedene 
Animationen der rotierenden Masse, jede Vertretung solches phenomona, 
die verwittern Änderungen, Erdbeben, Temperaturwechsel, Vulkane, 
Jahreszeiten und andere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans ce ther de collection il y a les diverses 
animations de la terre de rotation, chaque apparence un tel phenomona 
comme survivent à des changements, tremblements de terre, 
changements de température, volcans, saisons et d'autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste ther da coleção estão os vários 
animations da terra revolvendo, cada exibição tal phenomona como 
resistem mudanças, terremotos, mudanças de temperatura, vulcões, 
estações e outras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo ther dell'accumulazione sono le varie 
animazioni della terra di giro, ogni rappresentazione tale phenomona 
come espongono all'aria cambiamenti, terremoti, mutamenti di 
temperatura, vulcani, stagioni ed altre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την συλλογή ther είναι διάφορες 
ζωτικότητες της γης, κάθε μια που εμφανίζει τέτοιο phenomona 
όπως καιρικές αλλαγές, σεισμοί, αλλαγές θερμοκρασίας, 
ηφαίστεια, εποχές και άλλες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ther de la colección están las varias 
animaciones de la tierra que gira, cada demostración phenomona tal 
que resisten los cambios, los terremotos, los cambios de temperatura, 
los volcanes, las estaciones y otras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jahreszeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">saisons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stagioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εποχές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estaciones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tierra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
